00044 class CSwordPresenter : public CPresenter  {
00045    Q_OBJECT
00046 public: 
00047     enum features {
00048         strongNumbers = 0x000000010, /* Set if Strong's numbers are supported*/
00049         footnotes = 0x000000020, /* Set if footnotes are supported*/
00050         language = 0x000000040, /* Set if different languages are supported (for example in the key chooser)*/
00051         textColor = 0x000000080, /* Set if different text colors are supported*/
00052         highlightedVerseColor = 0x000000100, /* Set if different color for the highlighted verse are supported*/
00053         verseNumberColor = 0x000000200, /* Set if different colors for the versenumber are supported*/
00054         backgroundColor = 0x000000400, /* Set if different background colors are supported*/
00055         font = 0x000000800  /* Set if different fonts are supported*/
00056   };    
00057     enum events {
00058     strongNumbersChanged = strongNumbers,
00059     footnotesChanged = footnotes,
00060     languageChanged = language,
00061     textColorChanged = textColor,
00062     highlightedVerseColorChanged = highlightedVerseColor,
00063     verseNumberColorChanged = verseNumberColor,
00064     backgroundChanged = backgroundColor,
00065     fontChanged = font      
00066   };
00067 
00071     CSwordPresenter(ListCSwordModuleInfo useModules, CImportantClasses* importantClasses, QWidget *parent=0, const char *name=0);
00075     ~CSwordPresenter();
00079   int getFeatures();
00083   virtual void refresh( const int events );
00087   ListCSwordModuleInfo& getModuleList();
00088 
00089 public slots: // Public slots
00093   virtual void lookup(const QString&);
00097   CKeyChooser* getKeyChooser() const;
00098 
00099 protected: // Protected methods
00103   void printKey(CKey*, CKey*, CSwordModuleInfo*);
00107   void refreshFeatures();
00108 
00109     KToolBar* m_mainToolBar;
00110     KPopupMenu* m_popup;
00111     QPopupMenu* m_lexiconPopup;
00112     CKeyChooser* m_keyChooser;
00113     CHTMLWidget* m_htmlWidget;  
00114   CModuleChooserBar* m_moduleChooserBar;
00115   ListCSwordModuleInfo m_moduleList;
00116     CImportantClasses* m_important;
00117 
00118     QString m_highlightedVerse;
00119         
00120 protected slots: // Protected slots
00121   void lookupWord(int ID);
00122 
00123 signals: // Signals
00124   void lookupInLexicon(const QString& text, const QString& lexicon);
00125 
00126 private:
00127     int m_features;
00128 };
